comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: There is a James Joseph Feely in the 1901 and 1911 census. His wife, Mary Clare, was 49 in 1901, but mysteriously 62 in 1911!

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: Of Church Road, Tramore. Also on that census page, Power and Galwey families!
